## size

### Parameters

-   `width` **[string][1]** 
-   `height` **[string][1]** If unspecified will use width value by default. (optional, default `width`)

Returns **[string][1]** 

[1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String
